thread.title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa toss birthday bash for son | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa toss birthday bash for son | Daily Mail Online

author: Paul Chavez For Dailymail.Com
title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa toss birthday bash for son | Daily Mail Online
text: Wiz, 29, donned a black hoodie and grey slacks for his son's birthday party. Chyna, 28, smiled as she showed some moves on the dance floor. Dance moves: Blac Chyna showed off her dance moves on social media Decked out: Blac showed off her Adidas tracksuit She wore an Adidas outfit with a colorful nature scene and a denim jacket to celebrate with her longtime friend Amber. The on and off girlfriend of Rob Kardashian, 29, also sported a black beanie and held a bottle of water while dancing. Chyna and Rob who have 14-week-old baby daughter Dream together ended their rocky relationship yet again, according to an article Thursday by Us Weekly . In a good mood: Lamar looked to be in high spirits Under the tent: Wiz and Amber tossed a superhero themed birthday party for Sebastian Good times: Sebastian wore super make-up for his birthday bash Lamar meanwhile had his divorce from Khloe Kardashian, 32, finalized last October after she first filed to legally split in December 2013. Khloe and Lamar married in September 2009 exactly one month after meeting at a party for his former Lakers teammate Ron Artest. Their wedding was featured on Keeping Up With The Kardashians and they starred in their own spin-off series Khloe & Lamar. On the mic: The birthday boy gave a speech during his party Khloe dismissed divorce proceedings in October 2015 after Lamar was found unconscious following a bender at a Nevada brothel. Lamar rallied from near death after he suffered several strokes and kidney failure. The former Lakers and Clippers star has an upcoming reality series due out that will document his road to recovery after years of drug abuse. Cool cake: Sebastian celebrated his fourth birthday with a three-layer cake The Queens, New York-native entered a rehab facility in December for a 30-day stint as a 'precautionary measure,' a source recently told People. Lamar last month appeared on The Doctors television show and said he 'was basically just committing suicide' with is drug use. Amber and Wiz started dating in 2011 and got in engaged in March 2012 and married in July 2013 after welcoming Sebastian in February 2013. Super theme: The birthday bash featured a superhero theme with plenty of Spider-Man They divorced in 2014 with Amber citing irreconcilable differences and they have joint custody of Sebastian. Amber participated last year on season 23 of Dancing With The Stars and finished in ninth place with pro partner Maksim Chmerkovskiy. She dated his brother Val Chmerkovskiy for five months before their split earlier this month. Lakers star: Lamar is shown during a Los Angeles Lakers home game against the Portland Trail Blazers in March 2011 Read more: Share or comment on this article 314
